title: Task
description: This schema defines the Task entity. A task is a unit of computation in a Pipeline.

id.description: Unique identifier that identifies a task instance.

name.description: Name that identifies this task instance uniquely.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this Task. It could be title or label from the pipeline services.

fullyQualifiedName.description: A unique name that identifies a pipeline in the format 'ServiceName.PipelineName.TaskName'.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity.

taskUrl.description: Task URL to visit/manage. This URL points to respective pipeline service UI.

downstreamTasks.description: All the tasks that are downstream of this task.

taskType.description: Type of the Task. Usually refers to the class it implements.

taskSQL.description: SQL used in the task. Can be used to determine the lineage.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this entity.

service.description: Link to service where this pipeline is hosted in.
